document.full_text: the white house accused the syrian government on monday of inciting deadly border clashes between israeli troops and palestinian demonstrators, saying damascus was trying to distract attention from its own violent crackdown on protests.
document.title: u.s. accuses syria of inciting israel border clashes
lines_and_colors: the white house accused the syrian government on monday of inciting deadly border clashes between israeli troops and palestinian demonstrators, saying damascus was trying to distract attention from its own violent crackdown on protests.
